extendedInfo.description: Create you next SWTOR charachter with free (and advertisment free too) SWTOR Talents Calculator!SWTOR Talents Calculator is the app that lets you create your charachter in Star Wars: The Old Republic by assigning your points to each skill.Choose your class between the 16 available and explore the skill trees, assigning your points and unlocking the advanced skills.Version 1.1.Added:1)Now you can add and remove points by one.(To do this,select talent, then click on "+" or "-" button)2)Added builds manager.Now you can save your builds!(To manage your builds,click on the "Menu" button, then click on "Builds Manager")There is 3 slots for build in free version.I will add full version with unlimited slots in 2 or 3 days.3)Info system remaked.4)Fixed some bugs.Hot to control:1)Long pressing each skill, you can find out the skill bonuses for every level.2)Menu button click will open button to reset talent tree and builds manager.3)To add or remove 1 point from a talent,first, select talent from talents tree,then click on "+" or "-" buttons.Will be added in next version:1)German,French and Russian localizations.2)Tabs support.If you find some bugs or errors,please feedback me via email.Star Wars: The Old Republic content and materials are trademarks and copyrights of Electronic Arts or its licensors. All rights reserved.tags:Star Wars,Swtor,Talent,Calculator.

reviews.title: Not for tablets
reviews.comment: This could be a good app, but it is not optimized for tablets. So small I could not read. I like the idea though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Smuggler trees are bugged can only input 30 points and cannot use any sharpshooter skills tier4 or above
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App - Minor Problems
reviews.comment: Works great and good alternative to planning builds when not at home. Smuggler and Trooper trees are bugged though, please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Wrong stats in marauder annihilation tree....need to fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app however it force (no pun intended) when i try to open or delete my sith sorcerer tree.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet users beware
reviews.comment: This is a great idea and would be even better if it was legible on tablets.  Once this is optimized for use on tabkets will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: It is not 100% accurate. For instance, in the commando trees, the combat medic tree and gunnery tree have their names reversed, which confused me big time when I was searching the forums while trying to make a build as well. Nothing huge, but would like it updated and fixed. Other than small things like that this app is great for planning out your characters progression!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I know how to use it.
reviews.comment: I select the skill, press the plus and nothing happens. I can press hold and bring up desc. but plus just doesnt work. Even pressing around the area. Some skills are in wrong place, and some the description is wrong. Needs to be updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Good for keeping in mind how I want to level characters, but has a few minor problems. Imperial assassin has the right title, but the description for deployed shields. And it forced closed when i accidentally pressed save before naming a build, causing me to have to redo the whole thing. And the free version only has 3 saves available, so keep that in mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, needs updating.
reviews.comment: The best SWtOR skill building app on the market, but needs updating.  Impossible to spend points above rank 4 in the Gunslinger sharpshooter tree.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes a bit
reviews.comment: 5 stars if it didn\'t crash when I check certain talents = uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App.  When is the update for 1.2 due?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Old trees are bad
reviews.comment: Recent update was good, but the SI trees are still the old ones. Only 3 stars due to tree updates not being addressed now two weeks after the change in game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great tool. Vanguard defense tree bottom tier wrong skill has third point
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7 User
reviews.comment: This app is complete crap. The UI, images, and calculations all suck. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, this app is worthless.
reviews.author: Tim Keen

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Put in some extra work to make it look more proffesional and clean and you got yourself a great app. Just feels a bit amateur-ish still. And FTR, you mispelled \"character\" in your descriptions: you wrote \"charachter\" not \"character\"
reviews.author: Boris Frlic

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice but would be better if it gave a description on talent tree
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app but only let\'s you build 3 trees before you have to buy the full version ... And there is no full version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for Tablets
reviews.comment: This is not meant for tablets. Res is all wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Work!
reviews.comment: Really good application. If it was possible to save your talent trees, I would give 5 stars. It\'s almost perfect.
